resources.string: Dear Peter\nWelcome to my code space
The volume of the sphere is:

I am Claude De-Tchambila, a software developer, I mainly specialize in mobile development. Being an undergraduate at the Cape Peninsula University of Technology I have been introduced to Java and have heavily worked on writing algorithms as well as exploring data structure. 


In my spare time I go through tutorials, code and oftentimes read programming books. Basically, I have fun discovering new technologies and their relevance to solving real world problems. Currently I am working on increasing my portfolio size, most of my activities can be seen by TAPING ON MY PROFILE IMAGE ABOVE. 


In my early programming days I was introduced to programming by writing web pages using HTML, CSS and JavaScript, though I still do some web developing It hasn't been my focus lately. During my study period which is basically from January to November (having holidays in between) I mostly stick to academic work and study the materials I am given, I only get enough time to explore exploring different Tech stuff on holidays. At university I get to complete various It related projects, some of them are group projects and others individual ones.


 I am so glad to be in the IT industry and I am open and looking forward to exploring the limits of what Technology offers us.
